birth.name: Diana Tai
birth.description: thank you for teaching me the importance of honesty and always bringing a contagious excitement to every movie we watch

birth.name: Jerry Hsiao
birth.description: thank you for demonstrating the importance of apologizing and showing me the beauty of nature

elementary school.name: Norah Langton
elementary school.description: thank you for introducing me to the world of piano - it has become such an integral part of who I am today

elementary school.name: Linda Penrice
elementary school.description: thank you for welcoming me to elementary school a year early and laying the foundation for my public speaking skills

elementary school.name: Amy Hall
elementary school.description: thank you for encouraging me to continue learning music and showing me how I can use these talents in worship

elementary school.name: Caleb Mulder
elementary school.description: thank you for being the best workout buddy and inspiring me to be courageous in my faith

elementary school.name: Paul Chen
elementary school.description: thank you for exhibiting how important it is to bring a seemingly-infinite amount of enthusiasm to anything I lead

elementary school.name: Elliot Pai
elementary school.description: thank you for being as close to a brother that I could have - I owe a lot of my sillyness to you!

elementary school.name: Jeremy Kuikman
elementary school.description: thank you for igniting my love for math (and dodgeball)

high school.name: Brenda Csordas
high school.description: thank you for having such a contagious passion for biology and dedicating so much of your time to helping me prepare for university

high school.name: Brian Garcia
high school.description: thank you for providing me with the advice and environment to grow my love for chess

high school.name: Michael D'Agostino
high school.description: thank you for using your incredible intelligence to very patiently teach us about chemistry

high school.name: David McCreary
high school.description: thank you for introducing me to the world of graphic design - without it I would have never discovered my passion for UX/UI design!

high school.name: Danielle Curtis
high school.description: thank you for stretching my photography and creativity to limits that I would have never imagined

university.name: Daniel Kwon
university.description: thank you for providing me with invaluable resume advice and guiding me through my first co-op application season

university.name: Judy Zhong
university.description: thank you for inspiring me to pursue product design and coaching me through design interview questions

university.name: Michael Shiozaki
university.description: thank you for welcoming me to my first year of university acapella!

university.name: Vevina Trinh
university.description: thank you for guiding me through the portfolio ideation, design, and development process

university.name: Igor Ivkovic
university.description: thank you for fascinating me with the intricacies of computer architecture and caring so much for your students both inside and outside of the classroom

university.name: Shi Cao
university.description: thank you for blending interactivity and art into your lectures

university.name: Sharon Zheng
university.description: thank you for inspiring me to integrate my love for design and development into my passion projects
